responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "D330C71942E731F0FB4F97A7AFB2C97D", "Stay wary, friend. I expect you\'ll find more than the Ramkin we\'ve fought so far when you arrive. Everything that\'s been reported to me suggests that their masters are lurking nearby, pulling the strings. Keep your wits about you, and don\'t enter the mountain alone! I have a feeling something big is looming just outside of our firelight.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_RunesingerNaho_14_Response
